verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> pay <S%H7181>attention<s%> to my <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> <S%H5186>Turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to my <S%H8394>understanding:<s%>
that you may <S%H8104>maintain<s%> <S%H4209>discretion,<s%> that your <S%H8193>lips<s%> may <S%H5341>preserve<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
For the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of an <S%H2114>adulteress<s%> <S%H5197>drip<s%> <S%H5317>honey.<s%> Her <S%H2441>mouth<s%> is <S%H2509>smoother<s%> than <S%H8081>oil,<s%>
But in the <S%H319>end<s%> she is as <S%H4751>bitter<s%> as <S%H3939>wormwood,<s%> and as <S%H2299>sharp<s%> as a <S%H6310>two-edged<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
Her <S%H7272>feet<s%> go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4194>death.<s%> Her <S%H6806>steps<s%> lead <S%H8551>straight<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
She gives no <S%H6424>thought<s%> to the <S%H4570>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%> Her <S%H4570>ways<s%> are <S%H5128>crooked,<s%> and she <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know it.
Now <S%H1121>therefore,<s%> my sons, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H5493>me.<s%> Don't depart from the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H7368>Remove<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H7126>her.<s%> Don't come near the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1004>house,<s%>
lest you <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1935>honor<s%> to <S%H312>others,<s%> and your <S%H8141>years<s%> to the cruel <S%H394>one;<s%>
lest <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H7646>feast<s%> on your <S%H3581>wealth,<s%> and your <S%H6089>labors<s%> enrich another <S%H5237>man<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>
You will <S%H5098>groan<s%> at your <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H1320>end,<s%> when your flesh and your <S%H1320>body<s%> are <S%H3615>consumed,<s%>
and <S%H559>say,<s%> "How I have <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5006>despised<s%> <S%H8433>reproof;<s%>
neither have I <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H3384>teachers,<s%> nor <S%H5186>turned<s%> my <S%H241>ear<s%> to those who instructed <S%H3925>me!<s%>
I have come to the <S%H4592>brink<s%> of utter <S%H7451>ruin,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>gathered<s%> <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>"
<S%H8354>Drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of your own <S%H953>cistern,<s%> running <S%H5140>water<s%> out <S%H8432>of<s%> your own <S%H875>well.<s%>
Should your <S%H4599>springs<s%> <S%H6327>overflow<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets,<s%> <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in the public <S%H7339>squares?<s%>
Let them be for yourself <S%H2114>alone,<s%> not for strangers with you.
Let your <S%H4726>spring<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%> <S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> in the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

A <S%H158>loving<s%> <S%H365>doe<s%> and a <S%H2580>graceful<s%> <S%H3280>deer<s%>â€” let her <S%H1717>breasts<s%> <S%H7301>satisfy<s%> you at all <S%H6256>times.<s%> Be <S%H7686>captivated<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> with her <S%H160>love.<s%>
For why should <S%H1121>you,<s%> my son, be <S%H7686>captivated<s%> with an <S%H2114>adulteress?<s%> Why <S%H2263>embrace<s%> the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of <S%H5237>another?<s%>
For the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> are <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He <S%H6424>examines<s%> all his <S%H4570>paths.<s%>
The <S%H5771>evil<s%> deeds of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3920>ensnare<s%> <S%H2256>him.<s%> The cords of his <S%H2403>sin<s%> hold him <S%H8551>firmly.<s%>
He will <S%H4191>die<s%> for lack of <S%H4148>instruction.<s%> In the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H200>folly,<s%> he will go <S%H7686>astray.<s%>
